acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill in Maps of the containing class type
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldSupportRecursiveMaps

tag.name: Basic types/Podam factory basic types test

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.pdm6.RecursiveMap
Then the Object should not be null
Then the recursive map should not be null
Then the recursive map should not be empty
Then each of the map elements should not be null
